replies.author: wangchujinqwe
replies.txt_content: 启动器设置的内存太多了。降低到1024左右即可

replies.author: xuantian
replies.txt_content: 可能是因为JAVA地址的原因把。

replies.author: t的僵尸
replies.txt_content: 卧槽，连Java你都不会，英语白学了
